hero.headline: Board of Directors
hero.subheadline: Leadership guiding the Murray Area Chamber of Commerce

intro.title: Our Leadership
intro.description: The Murray Area Chamber of Commerce is led by a dedicated Board of Directors who volunteer their time and expertise to serve the business community.

positions.title: Board Chair
positions.description: Leads the Board of Directors and sets strategic direction

positions.title: Vice Chair
positions.description: Supports the Chair and leads key initiatives

cta.headline: Interested in Board Service?
cta.description: We're always looking for passionate business leaders to join our board
